title: Storms (Captioned)
brief_description: This program teaches children about the basic forces of weather. Demonstrations using everyday objects to illustrate rising warm air, falling cool air and the water cycle. Original animation illustrates causes of lightning, thunder and tornadoes, while satellite views of hurricanes show their swirling winds.
